### Gregorian & Jalali Date Converter Functions

#### Numbers in Algorithm:

- 5844=(16*365)+(16/4)
- 361590=(30*33*365)+(30*8)
- 355746=361590-5844
- 355666=355746-79-1
- 355668=355746-79+1
- 605=621-16
- 990=30*33
- 1595=605+990
- 12053=(365*33)+(32/4)
- 36524=(365*100)+(100/4)-(100/100)
- 1461=(365*4)+(4/4)
- 146097=(365*400)+(400/4)-(400/100)+(400/400)
